markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Communal Healing](/Feats.aspx?ID=271) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=26" />
<trait label="Healing" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=89" />
<trait label="Positive" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=128" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 122 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You’re a conduit for positive energy, and as you channel it through you, it heals some of your minor injuries. When you cast the [_heal_](/Spells.aspx?ID=148) spell to heal a single creature other than yourself, you regain Hit Points equal to the spell level of the _heal_ spell.

<title level="2">Communal Healing leads to...</title>
[Improved Communal Healing](/Feats.aspx?ID=279)
name: Communal Healing
